Table.name: PRTY
Table.commentInRDBMS: A Party is an entity of interest.

Column.name: PRTY_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: PRTY_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: PRTY_ID
Column.comment: An identifier that uniquely identifies a party.

Column.name: PRTY_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different types of parties.

Column.name: INSTTTNL_SCTR
Column.comment: Institutional sectors in accordance with Regulation (EU) No 549/2013, Regulation (EU) No 575/2013 and Regulation (EU) No 1075/2013 of the European Central Bank (ECB/2013/40)(1).

Column.name: ECNMC_ACTVTY
Column.comment: Classification of counterparties according to their economic activities, in accordance with the NACE revision 2 statistical classification as laid down in Regulation (EC) No 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council.

Column.name: PRTY_TYP_ADDRS
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish parties between different types of addresses.

Column.name: LGL_PRSN_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different type of legal persons, e.g. assigned debtor.

Column.name: PLLNG_EFFCT_INDCTR
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if the pulling effect is applied.

Column.name: ORGNSTN_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different types of organisation.

Column.name: ORGNSTN_TYP_BY_PRCDNG_STTS
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between organisations where legal proceedings are ongoing and those without legal proceedings.

Column.name: PRTY_ID2
Column.comment: The party identifier of the ultimate parent undertaking accoring to Regulation (EU) 867/2016, defined as the "Counterparty identifier for the legal entity which is the ultimate parent undertaking of the counterparty. This ultimate parent undertaking has no parent undertaking. If the counterparty has no parent undertaking, the counterparty identifier for the counterparty itself is to be reported. Parent undertaking has the same meaning as defined in Article 4(1)(15)(a) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013.".

Column.name: PRTY_RFRNC_DT2
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: PRTY_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID2
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: GRP_ID
Column.comment: An identifier to uniquely identify each group.

Column.name: GRP_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: GRP_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: LEI
Column.comment: Reference code in line with the International Organization for Standardization’s (ISO) 17442 standard

Column.name: NM_ENTTY
Column.comment: The organisation name.

Column.name: BLNC_SHT_TTL1
Column.comment: Carrying value of total assets in accordance with Regulation (EU) 549/2013.

Column.name: ANNL_TRNVR1
Column.comment: Annual sales volume net of all discounts and sales taxes in accordance with Recommendation 2003/361/EC. Equivalent to the concept of 'total annual sales' in Article 153(4) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013.

Column.name: NMBR_EMPLYS1
Column.comment: Number of employees working for the counterparty, in accordance with Article 5 of the Annex to Recommendation 2003/361/EC.

Column.name: INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN_GNRL_GVNMNT_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between international organisations and general government.

Column.name: GNRL_GVRNMNT_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between central government and other government sectors according to the European system of accounts (ESA).

Column.name: GVRND_CNTRY_CD
Column.comment: Governed Country code is a code that indicates the country that is governed by the Central Government.

Column.name: INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN_CD1
Column.comment: Pseudo-ISO code for international organisations of the Eurostat’s ‘Balance of Payments Vademecum’.

Column.name: MLTLTRL_DVLPMNT_BNK_INDCTR
Column.comment: Multilateral development bank indicator specifies if the International organisation is a multilateral development bank or not.

Column.name: CNTRL_BNK_PRVT_SCTR_CMPNY_TYP
Column.comment: The central bank and private sector company role.

Column.name: ENTRPRS_INDCTR
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if a party is an enterprise according to EU recommendation 2003/361.

Column.name: INSTTTNL_SCTR_CNTRL
Column.comment: Controlled by national or foreign bodies specifies if a party is national private or foreign controlled according to European system of accounts (ESA) 2010.

Column.name: LGL_FRM
Column.comment: Type of business entity as defined in the national legal system.

Column.name: LSTD_CNTRL_BNK_PRVT_SCTR_CMPNY_INDCTR
Column.comment: An indicator specifying is a security is listed or not.

Column.name: CRPRTN_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between financial and non-financial corporations.

Column.name: FNNCL_CRPRTN_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between central banks, credit institutions and other financial corporations.

Column.name: CNTRL_BNK_TYP
Column.comment: European Cental Bank indicator disinguishes Central Banks between the one that is the European Central Bank (ECB) and all others that are not.

Column.name: INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN_CD
Column.comment: Pseudo-ISO code for the European Central Bank from the Eurostat’s ‘Balance of Payments Vademecum’ .
Column.constraintName: European Central Bank has international organisation code 4F

Column.name: MRKT_CPTLSTN_INDCTR
Column.comment:
Market capitalisation indicator classifies the Listed central bank and private sectory company as Large or Small market capitalisation.
Market capitalisation, or "market cap", of the Listed central bank and private sector company is the sum of the market capitalisations based on the market value of the total outstanding shares issued by the same listed legal entity or a group of legal entities across all stock markets globally, where the total outstanding shares issued by the group of legal entities refer to cases where the listed entity is a parent company of a group of legal entities. Large market cap is defined as a market capitalisation equal to or greater than USD 2 billion and small market cap is defined as a market capitalisation of less than USD 2 billion. (https://www.bis.org/basel_framework/chapter/MAR/21.htm?inforce=20230101&published=20200327)

Column.name: TYP_ECNMY
Column.comment: The economy to which the organisation relates (e.g. advanced or emerging economy)

Column.name: LGL_PRCDNG_STTS
Column.comment: Categories describing an entity's legal status in relation to its/his/her solvency based on the national legal framework.

Column.name: DT_INTTN_LGL_PRCDNGS
Column.comment: The date on which the legal proceedings were initiated.

Column.name: NTRL_PRSN_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between self employeed and non-self employeed natural persons.

Column.name: FRST_NM
Column.comment: The first name.

Column.name: LST_NM
Column.comment: The last name.

Column.name: BLNC_SHT_TTL
Column.comment: Carrying value of total assets in accordance with Regulation (EU) 549/2013.

Column.name: ANNL_TRNVR
Column.comment: Annual sales volume net of all discounts and sales taxes in accordance with Recommendation 2003/361/EC. Equivalent to the concept of 'total annual sales' in Article 153(4) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013.

Column.name: NMBR_EMPLYS
Column.comment: Number of employees working for the counterparty, in accordance with Article 5 of the Annex to Recommendation 2003/361/EC.

Column.name: ORGNSTNL_UNT_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different types of organisational units, like branches or investment funds / vehicles.

Column.name: PRTY_ID1
Column.comment: The party identifier of the involved organisation.

Column.name: PRTY_RFRNC_DT1
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: PRTY_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID1
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: GRP_ID1
Column.comment: An identifier to uniquely identify each group.

Column.name: GRP_RFRNC_DT1
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: GRP_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID1
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: LDNG_BRNCH_ANCRDT_RPRTNG_INDCTR
Column.comment: Leading branch indicator distinguishes Foreign branches into those that are considered leading branch for AnaCredit reporting and those that are Non-leading branches.

Column.name: UPU_SYSTM_PRTY_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different types of Registered postal code system parties.

Column.name: CNTRY_CD2
Column.comment: The country code according to ISO3166.

Column.name: TRRTRL_UNT
Column.comment: The region inside a country according to NUTS.

Column.name: CTY2
Column.comment: The city, town or village.

Column.name: STRT2
Column.comment: Entity's street address, including the street number.

Column.name: PSTL_CD1
Column.comment: Entity's postal code.

Column.name: CTY1
Column.comment: The city, town or village.

Column.name: STRT1
Column.comment: Entity's street address, including the street number.

Column.name: PSTL_CD
Column.comment: Entity's postal code.

Column.name: CNTRY_CD1
Column.comment: The country code according to ISO3166.

Column.name: CTY
Column.comment: The city, town or village.

Column.name: STRT
Column.comment: Entity's street address, including the street number.

Column.name: CNTRY_CD
Column.comment: The country code according to ISO3166.
